name: Unimpeded
description:
Row your boat across the bayou that happens to have evil blood fish in it.

Spacebar to row. Press again with good timing to go faster. Escape to switch to fullscreen, which isn't working, since I didn't realize until too late that I'd handled it totally wrong.

This is not what was originally planned. The plan was to make a progression of 2-3 similar gameplay variations with the one button that would then get combined into one final challenge, but it turned out that the design and visuals of each just took too long.

I like to shoot for the moon. It doesn't always work out so well.
